You're welcome. I have stumbled into another bug that I should submit
a JIRA for:

Basically, when changing the order of the DecideRules in a sheet (but
not the root / global stylesheet), you encounter an exception. This
makes reordering the rules impossible.

Jean-Noel

On Tue, Aug 26, 2008 at 5:29 PM, stearcorg <steve@...> wrote:
> hi Jean-Noel,
>
> i've checked in a fix for this issue. thanks for
> submitting the bug report and providing the add'l
> information.
